Skill API¶

Skill manipulation API

class api.views.skill.SkillCategoryViewSet(**kwargs)[source]¶

Inherits standard characteristics from GenericViewSet and additionally provides ‘create’, ‘retrieve’ and ‘list’ methods :

Endpoint: /skill_categories/
Methods: GET / POST / OPTIONS
Permissions:
- Default : IsJWTAuthenticated
model¶

alias of SkillCategory

class api.views.skill.SkillViewSet(**kwargs)[source]¶
Inherits standard characteristics from ModelViewSet:
Endpoint: /skills/
Methods: GET / POST / PUT / PATCH / DELETE / OPTIONS
Permissions:
- Default : IsJWTOwner
- GET : IsJWTAuthenticated
- POST : IsJWTSelf
model¶

alias of Skill
